issue.title: forum.release-apk.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://forum.release-apk.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforum.release-apk.com%2F) ### Comment Username: `@felix-22` > Many big ad placeholders on both Firefox & Chromium (Opera) on both main page and subpages, caused by `generichide` from AdGuard. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/qRcEmu1.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Yesterday i have been turned off this filer Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts.
But now problem is repeating with this filter NoCoin Filter List
Probably Google something changed. 
I think developer my to fix this and similar potential problems on other legal sites.
